Text: VEry nice, thanks for listing. Added it to my ebook collection for a future project. I have to be around 8-10,000 ebooks by now, but ihttp://thepiratebay.se/torrent/7743624/Game_Design_Secrets-2010kaiser#ts not enough, lol. So keep em coming! Especially the non-fiction stuff. Thanks!

lukescoot

We're working off a normal system to snag the e-book downloads at the moment. As soon as we get our shit together and buy some proper Hamsters to run our machines we'll have no restrictions as to our down/up limits.
Thanks for the comment and we'll do our best to make our uploads of e-books more frequent as soon as everything is organised.
